issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
This may be a device specific issue with the device: GETAC z710. We have not been able to test the issue as we do not have the device.

The device comes with a dock and the customer has found that undocking the device causes the application to restart/crash. Docking the device causes the app to background and return to an undesired screen. This also occurs with the Kitchen Sink app.

Attached are the resulting log files when the restart/crash occurs when docking and undocking the device.

Please also see their attached tiapp.xml file.

Any suggestions on things they could try? Is this something that is very device specific that we have no control over?
fields.summary: Android: Docking and Undocking device causes app to restart
fields.environment:
Application type: mobile Android app.
Titanium SDK: Titanium 2.1.4 (also tested in 3.1.3)
Platform & version: Android 4.1.1
Device: GETAC z710
Host Operating System: Windows 7 64bit
Titanium Studio: 3.1.3.201309132423

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
